json.home-adventure_sc01_02-scribbles: There's so much to do, so much to see! But first, let's get ready.
json.home-adventure_sc04_08-scribbles: Let's play in the front yard.
json.home-adventure_sc04_09-ink: But I want to play in the backyard.
json.home-adventure_sc04_10-scribbles: Front yard. Front yard. Front yard. Front Yard!
json.home-adventure_sc04_12-scribbles: Let's just stay inside until we figure out what to do.
json.home-adventure_sc05_14-scribbles: Hey, maybe we can make something with these boxes.
json.home-adventure_sc05_15-ink: Yeah! We could use them to make costumes!
json.home-adventure_sc05_16-scribbles: Can you make these boxes into costumes for us?
json.home-adventure_sc05_17-ink: Oooh, ooh, ooh. Draw a costume for me first.
json.home-adventure_sc06_18-ink: You can draw whatever you want!
json.home-adventure_sc06_19b-scribbles: I didn't think of drawing it like that.
json.home-adventure_sc06_19c-scribbles: This is going to be a great costume.
json.home-adventure_sc07_20-scribbles: Now would you draw a costume for me?
json.home-adventure_sc09_24-ink: Scribbles, you've got to see yourself.
json.home-adventure_sc09_28-scribbles: Okay, now what do we do?
json.home-adventure_sc09_29-ink: Let’s take our costumes out for an adventure!
json.home-adventure_sc09_30-scribbles: Can you draw us something to ride in?
json.home-adventure_sc10_33a-ink: It looks like it's going to be fast.
json.home-adventure_sc10_34c-scribbles: I see what you're doing. I like it.
json.home-adventure_sc11_38-ink: Wanna make more costumes and go for another ride, or continue with the story?
json.home-adventure_sc13_40-scribbles: Well, you wanted to play in the backyard, let's do that.
json.home-adventure_sc14_42-ink: It's nighttime already?! What happened to the day?
json.home-adventure_sc14_43-scribbles: I guess we spent the whole day playing.
json.home-adventure_sc14_45-scribbles: We should get ready for bed.
json.home-adventure_sc16_47-ink: What a great day. Goodnight, Scribbles.
json.home-adventure_sc16_51-ink: What? It's such a great costume, I want to wear it for pajamas.
json.party-adventure_sc01_01-ink: We've got to get ready! We've got to get ready!
json.party-adventure_sc01_04-scribbles: We're having a party? We've got to get ready!
json.party-adventure_sc02_05-scribbles: We need balloons, we need streamers, we need decorations!
json.party-adventure_sc04_11-ink: Great! Now it's time to par-tay!
json.party-adventure_sc04_12-scribbles: All right! Hey, who's this party for anyway?
json.party-adventure_sc04_14-scribbles: Snoogeldorf? I've never heard of a Snoogeldorf.
json.party-adventure_sc04_16-scribbles: You mean we did all of this for your friend who doesn't exist?
json.party-adventure_sc04_17-ink: Well, yeah... But you can draw the Snoogeldorf!
json.party-adventure_sc05_18-ink: What does a Snoogeldorf look like?
json.party-adventure_sc05_18a-ink: What could the Snoogeldorf look like this time?
json.party-adventure_sc05_19-scribbles: What does the Snoogeldorf's face look like?
json.party-adventure_sc06_20-ink: The Snoogeldorf! It's even snooglier than I imagined!
json.party-adventure_sc07_24-scribbles: Hey, we could use another friend at our party. Want to draw one?
json.party-adventure_sc08_25-ink: Want do draw somebody else, or do you want to keep going?
json.party-adventure_sc09_26-scribbles: Who could that be? We didn't invite anyone else.
json.party-adventure_sc09_30-scribbles: Uh oh. Everybody's hungry - and we forgot about food!
json.party-adventure_sc09_32-scribbles: But I don't know what a Snoogeldorf eats... Do you know? Can you draw some Snoogeldorf food on these plates?
json.party-adventure_sc11_33-ink: This looks snoogelectable. Everybody, dig in!
json.party-adventure_sc11_36-scribbles: Do our friends still look hungry? Want to draw more food? Or do you want to continue with the story?
json.party-adventure_sc14_40-scribbles: We'll take care of the decorations. Can you use the eraser to clean up the mess on the table?
json.party-adventure_sc15_42-scribbles: Well Ink, we did it. Our party was a success!
json.party-adventure_sc15_43-ink: Yeah! We should really do something to celebrate. Want to throw another party, or keep going?
json.party-adventure_sc17_44-scribbles: All of that partying wore me out. I think I need a nap. (Ink) Yeah, me too.
json.party-adventure_sc17_45-ink: All of that partying wore me out. I think I need a nap. (Ink) Yeah, me too.
json.rainy-adventure_sc01_02-ink: I know, Scribbles - isn't it great?! Don't you just love rainy days? Let's go out and have a rainy day adventure!
json.rainy-adventure_sc01_03-scribbles: And get my fur all wet? No way!
json.rainy-adventure_sc01_04-ink: But you can bring an umbrella!
json.rainy-adventure_sc02_09-ink: Ah rain. And puddles! Let's go puddle-jumping.
json.rainy-adventure_sc02_13-scribbles: Yes! Now we can do something nice and dry. Like... sidewalk-jumping.
json.rainy-adventure_sc02_15-ink: That's no fun at all. We need more rain. Can you draw some rain?
json.rainy-adventure_sc02_16-ink: You can use this special brush, or draw using anything you want!
json.rainy-adventure_sc02_17-scribbles: Wait, you're not gonna... Are you really...?
json.rainy-adventure_sc02_20-scribbles: Wait, I don't want to get... Wet.
json.rainy-adventure_sc02_21-scribbles: Wait, I don't want to get... Wet.
json.rainy-adventure_sc02_22-ink: Come on in, Scribbles! The puddle's fine!
json.rainy-adventure_sc03_32-scribbles: Let's see who lives down here. Can you draw some underwater creatures?
json.rainy-adventure_sc03_34b-ink: I think it's doing the crawl.
json.rainy-adventure_sc03_35-ink: Want to draw some more underwater creatures, or keep going?
json.rainy-adventure_sc03_38-scribbles: Look, they're putting on a show.
json.rainy-adventure_sc04_41-scribbles: That was great! You know, I wouldn't mind jumping in another puddle or two...
json.rainy-adventure_sc04_42-ink: Can you draw more rain, or do you want to keep going?
json.rainy-adventure_sc04_44-ink: See, Scribbles? Rainy days aren't so bad.
json.rainy-adventure_sc04_45-scribbles: They're starting to grow on me.
json.rainy-adventure_sc05_46-ink: Hey, look who followed us home!
json.space-adventure_sc01_01-scribbles: I just love a starry night. Hey Ink, you ever wonder what it's like in outer space?
json.space-adventure_sc01_02-ink: Yeah. I bet it's more exciting up there than it is down here.
json.space-adventure_sc01_03-ink: Hey, you want to go check it out?!
json.space-adventure_sc01_04-scribbles: You mean go to outer space?! I don't know... How would we get there?
json.space-adventure_sc01_05-ink: We could take the bus? Or a rocket ship... Or a flying space llama!
json.space-adventure_sc01_07-scribbles: Or you could draw something to take us to outer space.
json.space-adventure_sc01_09-scribbles: Here's a window to start us off. Can you draw the rest?
json.space-adventure_sc01_10a-scribbles: Oh wow! That reminds me of a space ship I once drew.
json.space-adventure_sc01_10b-scribbles: Thanks for helping us go to space.
json.space-adventure_sc01_11a-ink: I can't wait to ride in it!
json.space-adventure_sc01_11b-ink: This is going to be fun!
json.space-adventure_sc01_11c-ink: I think that space ship will go fast.
json.space-adventure_sc01_12-ink: WOWZA! I've always wanted to go to space in something like this!
json.space-adventure_sc01_13-scribbles: I hope it flies. I'll count us down: Ten-nine-eight-
json.space-adventure_sc01_15-scribbles: Ink, you're supposed to wait for the count-dooooooown!
json.space-adventure_sc01_16-scribbles: Ink, you're supposed to wait for the count-dooooooown!
json.space-adventure_sc02_18-scribbles: Oooh. So this is what space is like... Look at all of those asteroids!
json.space-adventure_sc02_23-scribbles: I wonder if we'll see a supernova.
json.space-adventure_sc02_25-scribbles: There's no such thing as a space pickle.
json.space-adventure_sc02_27-scribbles: I wish we could see more things...
json.space-adventure_sc02_28-scribbles: Can you draw us some more cool space stuff?
json.space-adventure_sc02_29b-scribbles: I never thought I'd see anything like that in space.
json.space-adventure_sc02_29d-scribbles: Want to use a different brush?
json.space-adventure_sc02_29e-scribbles: Where do you get your inspiration?
json.space-adventure_sc02_30d-ink: Is that what I think it is??
json.space-adventure_sc02_30e-ink: I like the way you use lines.
json.space-adventure_sc02_31-scribbles: Do you want to draw some more space stuff? Or keep going?
json.space-adventure_sc02_34b-ink: Which planet should we go to?
json.space-adventure_sc02_35-scribbles: How about a brand new planet no one's ever seen before:
json.space-adventure_sc03_42-scribbles: You can use this special brush! Or draw using anything you want.
json.space-adventure_sc03_44c-scribbles: I like what you've done with the place.
json.space-adventure_sc03_44f-scribbles: This is turning into a cool planet.
json.space-adventure_sc03_45c-ink: That color makes me happy. How does it make you feel?
json.space-adventure_sc03_49-scribbles: Why won't you let me finish the countdown?!
json.space-adventure_sc03_55-ink: Want to visit another planet? Or keep going?
json.space-adventure_sc04_58-scribbles: Wow. Space was even better than I imagined!
json.space-adventure_sc04_59a-ink: Look at all the planets we got to visit.
json.space-adventure_sc04_59b-ink: Look at the planet we got to visit.
json.space-adventure_sc04_59c-ink: We sure saw some interesting stuff up there.
json.space-adventure_sc04_60-scribbles: But you know what? This planet is pretty great too.
json.Studio_01-ink: We're glad you're here! Want to draw with us?
json.Studio_01-scribbles: We're glad you're here! Want to draw with us?
json.Studio_02-ink: Hey there! Thanks for drawing with us!
json.Studio_02-scribbles: Hiya! Thanks for drawing with us!
json.Studio_07-ink: Have you tried drawing on the walls? We don't mind!
json.Studio_08-scribbles: I just love drawing don't you?
json.Studio_13-scribbles: Wow! Your pictures are amazing! And so are you.
json.Studio_Feelings_T01-scribbles: Hey, Ink. How are you feeling today?
json.Studio_Feelings_T04-scribbles: Totally... Want to make a picture to show how you feel today?
json.Studio_Gallery_01-ink: Ahhhh! We'll put your drawings here.
json.Studio_Gallery_11-scribbles: Wow! We'll put your drawings here.
json.Studio_Gallery_12-ink: Wow, look at all this beautiful art you made! Which one's your favourite?
json.Studio_Gallery_12-scribbles: Look at all this beautiful art you made! Which one's your favourite?
json.Studio_Gallery_15a-scribbles: Tap a picture to make it bigger!
json.Studio_Home_03-scribbles: Look at that cardboard box! Tap it, and see where it takes us.
json.Studio_Home_04-ink: Tap the cardboard box to go on a costume-making adventure with us!
json.Studio_Hub_01-ink: Tap the arrows to find more fun things to do!
json.Studio_Hub_02-scribbles: To start over, tap the red trash can.
json.Studio_Party_05-ink: Oooh check out the balloon! Tap it, and see where it takes us.
json.Studio_Party_06-scribbles: Tap the balloon and go on a party adventure with us!
json.Studio_portraits_T05a-scribbles: I love the way you drew me!
json.Studio_portraits_T06-ink: Who do you want to draw?
json.Studio_Praise_03-scribbles: That's exactly how I imagined it.
json.Studio_Praise_04-scribbles: Wow, how'd you think of that?
json.Studio_Praise_05-scribbles: Try making different kinds of lines. Thick or thin. Straight or squiggly.
json.Studio_Praise_06-scribbles: You should feel proud of what you drew.
json.Studio_Praise_07-scribbles: You are putting a lot of thought into this.
json.Studio_Praise_08-scribbles: You're working hard on that drawing!
json.Studio_Praise_09-ink: We're lucky that you're helping us draw.
json.Studio_Praise_10-ink: Have you tried using all the art tools yet?
json.Studio_Praise_11-ink: <gasp> Watching you draw makes me excited!
json.Studio_Praise_12-ink: Wow, colours can look so different when they're next to other colours. It's amazing!
json.Studio_Praise_16-ink: What else could you add to your drawing? Something little, or something big?
json.Studio_Rainy_07-scribbles: Hey, a yellow umbrella! Tap it, and see where it takes us.
json.Studio_Rainy_08-ink: Tap the umbrella to go on a rainy day adventure!
json.Studio_Shapes_T02-scribbles: I'm making some shape doodles. Try it!
json.Studio_Shapes_T04-scribbles: What different things can you draw with shapes?
json.Studio_Space_09-scribbles: Tap the planet to go on an outer space adventure!
json.Studio_Space_10-ink: Tap the planet, and see where it takes us.
json.Studio_Tools_T02-scribbles: Hmmm... no. Have you seen my pencil?
